subject: Congratulations Dear Beneficia
body:
Congratulations Dear Beneficiary
I am hereby to inform you that United Nations has concluded to
compensate you with the sum of $20,000,000.00 USD
after the last discussion that was held today
with the United States president and FBI  which you were to receive
the sum of $5,000,000.00 USD Daily through
Western Union office until the total
amount of your funds $20,000,000.00 is completed on your name,I will
be waiting on your urgent response
to forward your first payment pick up
information today at Western Union location around you.God bless you.
Regards
Mr. Antonio Guterres
Email:antonioguterres487@gmail.com

subject: Re: Congratulations Dear Beneficia
body:
Hello Mr. Antonio Guterres,

Wow, that's quite a surprise! I'm thrilled to hear about this compensation from the United Nations. It's not every day you get news like this.

Could you please provide more details about how this came to be? How was my name chosen for this compensation? And why is it being distributed through Western Union?

Looking forward to hearing more about this exciting opportunity.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eric
